                                         javafx.scene.Node chatNode,
                                         boolean chatMovable)
        Fade the current screen out.
        Parameters:
        nextFxmlPath - The path to the next scene's fxml.
        nodeToFade - The node to fade out.
        chatNode - The chat node to transfer / keep.
        chatMovable - Indicates whether the chat node should be movable on the next screen.
